The publication date and sharing activit: indicating that they have been circulating since January 10, 2020, and have been shared more than 9,200 times.
The content of the photos: which show men standing around a pile of assorted items, as well as copies of the Quran lying on the ground.
The Indonesian and Arabic caption of the: which translates to English as "China burns the Korans, religious books, carpets, and everything related to Islam in East Turkestan!" and includes statements about the burning of the Quran in Europe and East Turkestan.
